page.title: 05CONEYGREEN FARM, Stourport
page.content: The owner of ConeyGreen Farm has lived there for 55 years. There are 65 sheep and 55 head of cattle. He owns 135 acres,and has normal farm machinery for size of farm. The farm joins Areley Wood+Ribbesford Wood.It is at the foot of Stagborough Hill,and it is near Gladderbrook. They make items from timber.The farm- land is mainly rough enclosed grazing and cereal crops.Main types of farming:Mixed stock and cereal. They have 12 rooms in the farm. The farm used to be a Holiday Inn.
